name: days-i-have-been-single
description: A minimalist, terminal-style single-page website that displays a real-time counter showing how many days you've been single. Built with Eleventy and Tailwind CSS.

scripts.build: pnpm run build:css && pnpm run build:eleventy
scripts.start: pnpm run build:css && pnpm run watch:eleventy
scripts.dev: pnpm run build:css && pnpm run watch:eleventy

author: dfanso
